query:
SELECT 
  'time_series' as table_name, COUNT(*) as record_count FROM time_series
UNION ALL SELECT 'research_publications', COUNT(*) FROM research_publications
UNION ALL SELECT 'economic_events', COUNT(*) FROM economic_events
UNION ALL SELECT 'indicators', COUNT(*) FROM indicators
UNION ALL SELECT 'glossary_terms', COUNT(*) FROM glossary_terms
UNION ALL SELECT 'sources', COUNT(*) FROM sources
UNION ALL SELECT 'organizations', COUNT(*) FROM organizations
UNION ALL SELECT 'commercial_banks', COUNT(*) FROM commercial_banks
UNION ALL SELECT 'users', COUNT(*) FROM users
UNION ALL SELECT 'stakeholders', COUNT(*) FROM stakeholders
UNION ALL SELECT 'data_gap_tickets', COUNT(*) FROM data_gap_tickets
UNION ALL SELECT 'scheduler_jobs', COUNT(*) FROM scheduler_jobs
ORDER BY record_count DESC;
